subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
Dating and Relationships
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy won a prestigious golf tournament Sunday, days after breaking off his engagement with Caroline Wozniacki, who tried to make a strong statement of her own at the French Open.
snippet: Rory McIlroy won a prestigious golf tournament Sunday, days after breaking off his engagement with Caroline Wozniacki, who tried to make a strong statement of her own at the French Open.
